name: Victoria Clair and the Mystery Express (itch)
name_original: Victoria Clair and the Mystery Express (itch)
description:
I made this during quarantine to see if I could and for the experience of it all. Soundtrack by Nate Aune and voice acting by Riley Noland and my cat, Sparta. Typewriter and Shop Bell SFX are sourced from online with the CC0 license.  Uses Unity and Fungus. Everything else I made myself!

Support

I had to get Victoria to time-travel to the future so that we could shoot the trailer -- and, as you can imagine, coffee is a lot more expensive now than it was in 1920.

So, if you enjoyed the game, please consider donating to Victoria's coffee fund!

 

In all seriousness, this is just a virtual tip jar for people who are feeling tippy. Please don't feel pressured to donate anything!!

You can also buy our soundtrack right here on Itch; all proceeds from soundtrack sales go to my good friend Nate, who made all the music for the game!

 Links

For updates on my latest games, please follow me on Twitter! I also post regular updates on my website.

For more of Nate, check out his Soundcloud and his Bandcamp!

Victoria Clair and The Mystery Express is also available on Steam -- now featuring achievements! Who doesn't love achievements?
